articles.title: 31 Dead In Assam, Meghalaya Floods, 3,000 Villages Under Water
articles.description: The flood situation in Assam and Meghalaya has deteriorated with rising water levels in major rivers and 31 people losing their lives, amid incessant rain triggering landslides in many places across the two states.
articles.content: <li>At least 19 lakh people in 28 districts of Assam have been affected by the floods with the newly formed Bajali district being the worst hit. The water levels in the Brahmaputra and Gauranga river… [+2053 chars]

articles.title: Agnipath protests: Section 144 imposed in Gurgaon
articles.description: DM Nishant Kumar Yadav said more protests are likely to happen against the Agnipath scheme in various Haryana districts, including Gurgaon and Section 144 had to be imposed to avoid disturbances.

articles.title: NCERT drops content on Gujarat riots from Class 12 textbook
articles.description: According to a note on the rationalised content released by the NCERT on Thursday, pages 187-189 on Gujarat riots are among the removals from the book. The pages also carry an image of the front page of The Indian Express dated March 1, 2002.

articles.title: Congress Seeks Action Against Officials Over "Leaks" In Rahul Gandhi Questioning
articles.description: The Congress has sought action against Enforcement Directorate officials who "selectively leaked" to some media houses information related to Rahul Gandhi's questioning, as the party also served a legal notice on three Union ministers over the issue.
articles.content:
Congress said this is a selective leaks by the ED to malign Rahul Gandhi's image.
